term.title: potentiometric detection method

item.text: A detection method in which the potential of a cell is related to the concentration (activity) of a reactant which is a component of the cell fluid.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2186 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
